attributes.action: Reduce Ancestry Visa holders' need to be self-supporting from 7 years to 3 years.
attributes.additional_details: Reduce Ancestry Visa holders' need to be self-supporting from 7 years to 3 years.  These people are descendants of UK born grandparents, so they are not "foreigners" and thus should not be treated as such.  The government should stop treating their colonialists' grandchildren as pariahs - they did not choose to be born in a non-UK country.
